Logo
  • {{nav.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { navs=[ {name:"Home",url:"/home"}, {name:"Products",url:"/products"}, {name:"Contact",url:"/contact"}, ] }
